title: Hung Up
author: Madonna
lyrics:
[00:06.40] Time goes by so slowly
[00:10.49] Time goes by so slowly
[00:14.15] Time goes by so slowly
[00:18.18] Time goes by so slowly
[00:21.89] Time goes by so slowly
[00:25.75] Time goes by so slowly
[00:28.51] 
[01:00.44] Every little thing that you say or do
[01:03.34] I'm hung up
[01:05.25] I'm hung up on you
[01:07.94] Waiting for your call, baby, night and day
[01:11.38] I'm fed up
[01:12.94] I'm tired of waiting on you
[01:15.51] Time goes by so slowly for those who wait
[01:20.67] No time to hesitate
[01:23.12] Those who run seem to have all the fun
[01:26.52] I'm caught up, I don't know what to do
[01:31.04] Time goes by so slowly
[01:34.96] Time goes by so slowly
[01:38.67] Time goes by so slowly
[01:43.79] I don't know what to do
[01:46.28] Every little thing that you say or do
[01:49.42] I'm hung up
[01:51.42] I'm hung up on you
[01:53.98] Waiting for your call, baby, night and day
[01:57.18] I'm fed up
[01:59.00] I'm tired of waiting on you
[02:01.60] Every little thing that you say or do
[02:04.96] I'm hung up
[02:06.83] I'm hung up on you
[02:09.36] Waiting for your call, baby, night and day
[02:12.42] I'm fed up
[02:14.45] I'm tired of waiting on you
[02:17.15] Ring, ring, ring goes the telephone
[02:20.48] The lights are on but there's no one home
[02:24.67] Tick, tick tock it's a quarter to two
[02:27.86] And I'm done, I'm hanging up on you
[02:32.97] I can't keep on waiting for you
[02:40.56] I know that you're still hesitating
[02:45.30] 
[02:48.22] Don't cry for me, 'cause I'll find my way
[02:53.37] 
[02:55.91] You'll wake up one day
[03:01.65] But it'll be too late
